casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

June 22, 2007

[Cite as 06/22/2007 Case Announcements #2, 2007-Ohio-3117.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0686. Jean-Paul L. v. Michelle M.

Wood App. Nos. WD-06-040 and WD-06-051, 2007-Ohio-1042. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal as of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s emergency motion for stay of underlying proceedings,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

Lanzinger, J., dissents.
